past simple and past participle of sell sold on something
very enthusiastic about something : I can't say I'm sold on the idea.
See more sold out
When a film , concert, etc. is sold out, all of the tickets for it have been sold: By the time I tried to get a ticket, it was sold out.
When a shop is sold out of something, there is no more of that thing left to buy in it: I looked in three stores for it but they were all sold out.
